contribution_desc: This poster presents a system architecture for dynamic reconfigurations of tabletops in multi-device environments using simple magnetic switches and web technologies.
tracking_characteristic: Location 2D; Tracking devices only; Location Relative (left-right-top-bottom); Relative location; Outside-in tracking
toolkits: NodeJS; Arduino; Phaser (web game development framework); CCV (Community Core Vision); TUIO protocol (multitouch)
